citations.narrative:
The facility is not maintaining acquisition records for one red-tailed hawk, one red-shouldered hawk, one saw-whet owl,
one black vulture, one barred owl, six chickens, two budgies, and one chinchilla. Failure to maintain required records
prevents trace back of animals to their original source and does not allow inspectors to verify that the sourcing of animals
is compliant with the Animal Welfare Act.
The facility must ensure that records are maintained which fully and correctly disclose all information concerning each
animal which has been purchased, or otherwise acquired, owned, held or otherwise disposed of, in its possession or
under its control, or which is transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed. Correct by August 29, 2024.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have an environment enhancement plan for one red-tailed hawk, one red-shouldered hawk, one saw-
whet owl, one black vulture, six chickens, one barred owl, and two budgies. Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities
must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the
psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. The facility must develop an
environment enhancement plan for its birds as guided by their attending veterinarian. Correct by August 29, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility is not maintaining acquisition records for one red-tailed hawk, one red-shouldered hawk, one saw-whet owl, 
one black vulture, one barred owl, six chickens, two budgies, and one chinchilla. Failure to maintain required records 
prevents trace back of animals to their original source and does not allow inspectors to verify that the sourcing of animals 
is compliant with the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
The facility must ensure that records are maintained which fully and correctly disclose all information concerning each 
animal which has been purchased, or otherwise acquired, owned, held or otherwise disposed of, in its possession or 
under its control, or which is transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed. Correct by August 29, 2024. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility did not have an environment enhancement plan for one red-tailed hawk, one red-shouldered hawk, one saw-
whet owl, one black vulture, six chickens, one barred owl, and two budgies. Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities 
must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the 
psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. The facility must develop an 
environment enhancement plan for its birds as guided by their attending veterinarian. Correct by August 29, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
